attributes.action: 2nd Referendum is necessary to see if public still wants Brexit
attributes.additional_details: It is an entirely different picture compared to when the people were first asked, we can now make a more informed and concrete decision in the best interest of UK.
attributes.background: With Parliament continuing to struggle to reach an agreement regarding the UK’s departure from the European Union, I believe it is time that the public should be allowed to exercise their right to determine whether or not Brexit should proceed.
